Name: Potions!
About the game: Potions! is an ingredient juggling, potion slinging, 2D, pixel-art shop management game Brew and sell potions to customers during the day - prep during the night. Drink potions to survive your enemies. Unlock spells to defend your bustling Potion Cart. And move on to the next town, before your time runs out... Features Buy ingredients and combine them to make Potions Sell potions to customers or drink them yourself, to stay on top of your busy Potion Cart Manage stock, orders and customers Fill your recipe book with new Potions, while juggling ingredients from different regions. Travel across the land seeking new recipes and ingredients 9 regions with different customers, spells, recipes and dangers await you. Brave foul enemies and mysterious customers Collect spells to ward off those that might disrupt your shop Endless unique customers Serve a range of procedurally generated customers from different races, as you make your way across the land. Froggin will keep you company! Your enchanted frog will soothe you with local melodies.
